snippet.title: Industry Giant 4.0 - Official Early Access Announcement Trailer | Games Baked in Germany Showcase
snippet.description:
Are you the next Rockefeller, Jobs or Bezos? Put your business acumen to the test as you embark on a journey to economic dominance with Industry Giant 4.0, where you shape an industrial empire from the ground up. This immersive simulation goes beyond mere construction, offering a comprehensive experience in producing goods, building up logistics, industrial building, production planning, and financial management. Become the next business mogul and write history!

Industry Giant 4.0 is launching into Early Access in 2024 for PC (Steam). Visit Steam and add it to your wishlist now:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1129570/Industrie_Gigant_40/
